remarks: Composition is commutative for translations.  Part of proof of Lemma G of [Crawley] p. 116 (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-2013.)
statement:
ltrncom.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrncom.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrncom $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) -> ( F o. G ) = ( G o. F ) ) $.
